rounds.response:
I’m holding A♣ J♣ for top pair and a gut-shot Broadway draw on a non-flush board. Both players checked the flop, so VPIP is likely weak and this turn card Q♣ actually gives me a much stronger hand (top pair + broadway gut-shot + potential backdoor flush) while also helping my range more than most holdings. A big bet here can fold out weaker pairs and random floats, while still getting value against worse aces with bad kickers and any straight draws.

[Bet 70]
